law.catch_line: Conversion and continuation rights upon termination of group coverage.
law.text: Any group policy, group plan, or group contract issued, delivered, or renewed by a health maintenance organization shall include continuation rights for certificate holders, pursuant to KRS 304.18-110, and conversion rights for certificate holders equal to that provided in KRS 304.18-114 subject to the minimum benefits specified in KRS 304.18-120.
law.history: Amended 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 157, sec. 4, effective July 13, 2004. -- Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 105, sec. 26, effective July 15, 2002. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 427, sec. 12, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 163, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1986. -- Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 258, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1980.
